name: The Sovereign of Sydney
description: Experience the jewel of the harbour. The Sovereign offers unmatched luxury with panoramic views of the Opera House and Harbour Bridge.

name: Whitsunday Voyager
description: Perfect for exploring the Great Barrier Reef. This catamaran combines stability with style, offering diving equipment and a private chef option.

name: Gold Coast Galore
description: A sleek sports cruiser designed for speed and comfort. Ideal for day trips around the Broadwater. Includes a jet ski.

name: The Melbourne Majesty
description: Cruise the Yarra in style. This vessel features a heated interior lounge and a rooftop sun deck.

name: Perth Pearl
description: Discover the sunset coast on this modern yacht. Features open-plan living and a spacious aft deck for entertaining.

name: Tasmanian Explorer
description: Rugged luxury defined. Built for Tasmanian waters, this vessel offers warmth, comfort, and exceptional viewing platforms.

name: Darwin Dreamer
description: Enjoy the tropical north. Fully air-conditioned with a shaded flybridge, perfect for sunset cruises.

name: Coral Coast Cat
description: The ultimate platform for Ningaloo Reef adventures. Luxurious cabins and expansive decks for whale shark spotting.
